package.name: final_project
package.description: ROS2 side of a final project for ROB499/599 at Oregon State University. This package takes in an image taken by a camera mounted on a robot arm, finds the center of the image, crops the image around its center, and finds the color of the object (if there is one) at\ the center of the image. The detected color is turned into a velocity command to be sent to an Arduino using micro-ROS.
